setting_0_action.name: Action Setting
setting_0_action.desc: This setting can be pressed to trigger an action.

setting_1_boolean.name: Boolean Setting
setting_1_boolean.desc: This setting can only be true or false.

setting_2_decimal.name: Decimal Setting
setting_2_decimal.desc: This setting can only be decimals.

setting_3_decimal_range.name: Decimal Range Setting
setting_3_decimal_range.desc: This setting can only be a decimal in a valid range.

setting_4_formid.name: FormID Setting
setting_4_formid.desc: This setting can only be a valid FormID.

setting_5_formtype.name: FormType Setting
setting_5_formtype.desc: This setting can only be a valid FormType

setting_6_integer.name: Integer Setting
setting_6_integer.desc: This setting can only be an integer (whole number).

setting_7_integer_range.name: Integer Range Setting
setting_7_integer_range.desc: This setting can only be an integer in a valid range.

setting_8_key.name: Key Setting
setting_8_key.desc: This setting can only be a keybind.

setting_9_list.name: List of String Setting
setting_9_list.desc: This setting can only be a list of strings.

setting_10_map.name: Map of String to Integer Setting
setting_10_map.desc: This setting can only be a map of strings to integers.

setting_11_number.name: Number Setting
setting_11_number.desc: This setting can only be a valid number.

setting_12_string.name: String Setting
setting_12_string.desc: This setting can only be a valid string.

setting_13_values.name: Values Setting
setting_13_values.desc: This setting can only be Apple, Banana, or Pear of Destruction.
